references: To demonstrate how Standard Deviation Reduction may be used in practical federated learning scenarios to generate decision trees, we provide an illustrative example using a portion of the dataset that shown in TableÂ II. This dataset was generated in order to be used subsequently in the experimental analysis. The dataset stores information on the IoT devices that contribute in the federated learning rounds in terms of their type, deployment region, provider and observed accuracy. First of all, we should calculate the SD for the target which means the Accuracy denoted by SD(Accuracy). By applying the above-explained equations on the Accuracy feature we can find that:
